page.title: 05CLUBS / WILDLIFE
page.content:
swimming,bowling,squash, and the caravan club.
There are many plants such as:TREES, Oak,Beech,Sycamore,WILD FLOWERS, Foxgloves,Pink Campion and very rarely Cow Parsley. The {ARUNDELL ARMS}has private fishing on the river{LYD .}There is also a river warden which patrols the river banks. Also there are pretty walks on the bridel paths situated beside the river. There is a Heronry in{LIFTON}Park Farm.The fishermen don't like the herons but they are a protected species. There are a large amount of retired people in{LIFTON}. Ambrosia have 200 people working, 15% are local people.
